input.sentences: everyone is waiting to get in .
the television will be great to show my project .
a close up of a good friend who attended .
this is my presentation on paper .
this cup of coffee is so good .
output.sentences: There was a line of people waiting to get into the room.
When we got in, there was a television show projected onto the wall.
Our close friend attended with us.
He even gave a presentation of a paper he wrote.
Afterwards, we all went and enjoyed a cup of coffee.
